ComicInfo.Summary:
An escaped convict steals Kid Colt's horse and rides off to kill the lawman who had originally captured him. Kid Colt saves the marshal by taking his place, allowing the lawman to retire with a clean record.
Kid Colt saves a rancher and his daughter from a greedy landowner.
Kid Colt saves a rancher from being hanged and defeats the greedy landowner behind the crime.
Kid Colt comes to the aid of a railroad owner and his daughter who are being sabotaged by a competing stagecoach owner who's vying for control of the freighting business, and whose men, disguised as Indians, have attacked the train.
A thief robs a stagecoach and finds his escape thwarted at every turn. He finally succumbs to his inevitable fate, as a posse catches up to him in the desert, just in time to save his life.
Kid Colt captures bank robber Flint Waters, who swears vengeance and escapes, hounding Kid Colt until their showdown, where the thief dies in a rockslide.
An outlaw kills a farmer for his mysterious treasure and Kid Colt brings the murderer to justice.
ComicInfo.Tags: Marshal Rick Paley,Steel (Kid Colt's horse),Kid Colt [Blaine Colt],Yago James
ComicInfo.Title: A Man Named Colt!; Run for Your Life!; Gantry's Curse!
